## lokalise2 key delete

Delete a key

### Synopsis

Deletes a key from the project. Requires Manage keys admin right.

```
lokalise2 key delete [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help         help for delete
      --key-id int   A unique identifier of the key (required).
```
